prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is designed to leverage the power of large language models (like GPT or Claude) to transform human-computer interaction. It aims to make AI application development accessible to non-programmers and non-technical people while maintaining the benefits of version control systems.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, large language models, GPT, Claude, human-computer interaction, AI application development, non-programmers, non-technical people, version control systems
